Text: I don't know what the deal is, but there is no crack file anywhere on this iso.  Also, there is nothing to "unrar" it downloads directly as an iso and an nfo file.  Running setup literally downloads a demo from steam.  Reloaded is usually reliable, but I call bullshit on this one.
